Title: CyberConnect
Description: CyberConnect is an API for working with INSTEON, X10, and Z-Wave technologies that will run on .NET 4.5, 4.0, and .NETMF 4.3 - .NETMF 4.1
HomeWiki:
NOTE: Currently being developed. The goal of making the code available on CodePlex is to inspire and help others with similar problems in hopes of building .NET APIs and SDKs for embedded systems available to hobbyist developers. 

 

Project Description
CyberConnect is an API for working with INSTEON technologies that will run on .NET 4.5, 4.0, and .NETMF 4.3 - .NETMF 4.1 if and when completed.

Project Updates
Updates are available at http://blog.psibernetic.com/category/csharp/cyberconnect/

Notes
CyberConnect is primarily written using C#, but may include other CLS compliant languages such as F# for certain components. (Does not at this time.)
